item.description:
Wednesday, 9/15: 'Rack 'em up!!'
Location - Star Bar 8:00 PM

I know we have some pool sharks out there - Yes, Emily and Autumn, I'm talking to you!

We also have people who like to have fun!

We're not getting serious here, so if you're not a good pool player, you're still welcome - maybe the better players can give some pointers - and we can play teams so it's fun for all!

The Star Bar has a couple tables, and the drinks are not expensive, so come out and play, or join friends and cheer on the underdog!

Star Bar is located above Starbucks Coffee on the corner of Thames and Church Street - you enter on the Church Street Side.


*Star Bar is a bar that offers beautiful views of Newport Harbor. The establishment features high ceilings, large windows, comfortable couch seating, juke box music, pool tables, dart boards, and air hockey for entertainment. Star Bar opens nightly at 8:00 pm.
item.how_to_find_us: Find us: Near the pool tables, of course! If you can't find us, call Mark at 631-433-5223.
item.name: 'Rack 'em up!!' Pool Night - Star Bar, Newport
